title: Robert Buckland – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Robert Buckland, the Secretary of State for Wales, on Twitter on 14 October 2022.
content: Our priorities are to do the right thing by acting in our national interest to tackle the energy crisis, to grow our economy and to continue to rise to the challenge of Putin’s war in Ukraine.
